customEffectDescriptions.li: Affects all owners of any gene of the hive mind series.
The more pawns with this gene, the more efficient the hive.

GeneDef.label: shared skills
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a synchronized skill level.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every day or when a new mind is added, it synchronizes the skills.
Only the level is synchronized, experience is not affected.

GeneDef.label: shared thoughts
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a synchronized thoughts.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every day or when a new mind is added, it synchronizes the memories.
Only temporary memories are synchronized, permanent ones are not affected.
Allows to change the ideology of the entire mind to any desired one, at any time.

GeneDef.label: shared needs
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have synchronized needs.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every day or when a new mind is added, it synchronizes needs.
Only recreation, comfort, outdoors, indoors, beauty are synchronized.
